Был сегодня с утра 12.2 ранка. Стал играть. Попался в лапы призраку ииииии ЗАВИС вместе с ним к ХУЯМ-МОРЯМ. Тиммейты спокойненько закончили игру, понабивали себе очков, бегая вокруг нас, и ни одня блядина даже не попыталась заюзать обоссаный  фонарик (возможно не хотели зашквариться этим бесполезным предметом). Хост не захотел ливать, и спустя час я не выдержал и сам нажал ALT+F4. Получил в ебало 14.3 ЧЕТЫРНАДЦАТЫЙ РАНК, СУКА, c тремя каплями. Прошло некоторое время, я нажал снова на эту кнопочку JOIN TO LOBBY иииии сразу, без всяких загрузок оказался где-то хуй пойми: то ли под землей, то ли в аду. Понажимав пару раз на ЛКМ у меня сломалась игра СНОВА, и вылезло окошечко "завершения процесса". Подождав 10 минут, я понял, что нихуя не изменится и вышел. Угадайте что? Правильно, ЛОВИ ЕЩЕ МИНУС 3, уебище лесное.

Спрашивается НАХУЯ, вот серьезно, НАХУЯ добавлять в игру систему наказаний да еще и такую жесткую, не доделав её (игру) хотя бы до стабильного состояния???!!!!

P.S Еще я много чего здесь не написал, к примеру, что часто слышно звук люка (и ты на 100% уверен, что  видел и много раз использовал этот люк для побега), а его там попросту нет. Или то, что соединения нихуя не стабильные, нередко из-за этого невозможно убежать от преследователя, т.к твоего перса ВДРУГ ни с того ни с сего резко куда-нибудь перемещает (где-то на пару метров) и ты, таким образом, теряешь драгоценные секуны форы. Нередко жертву нельзя поднять с земли или вылечить.
Обновления нихуя не выходят. Русский язык не добавили, возможность пати с друзьми тоже, зато понерфили sprint birst, ведь это намного важнеее чем все вышеперечисленное


P.P.S Если вам поебать на рейтинг, на баги, на конченных тиммейтов и баланс игры, то можно спокойно играть, ни о чем не думая

[h1]Dead by Daylight[/h1]

Ja also schonmal ein Geiler Titel an sich!!!

Also Dead by Daylight ist kein Flower Power Unicorn Spiel tut mir Leid für die Leute die schon bis hier gelesen haben...

Es ist sondern das Horror Game schlecht hin. In Dead by Daylight gibt es Verschiedende Karten auf dennen man Spielen kann.
Ja was soll man darauf tun ?
Also ganz einfach...

Zu erst gibt es 4 Verschiedene Überlebende die sollen 5 Generatoren in stand setzten zudem noch ein Schalter betätigen um die Tür der Freiheit zu öffnen und um zu Entkommen.

Ja also jetzt fängt es an...
Zu Entkommen genau... wovor?

Außerdem.. gibt es noch ein Killer zu Zeit gibt es 3 verschiedende...
Es muss logischerweise die 4 Leute Jagen und Töten. 
Um am Ende als Sieger raus zu gehen.

Ja an sich ganz Simpel, so dann geht's mal weiter...

Die Klassen ob Killer oder Überlebender kann man Leveln in dem man am Ende einer Runde sich die Blutspunkte verdient.
Diese Punkte kann man in Fähigkeiten-Baum der jeweiligen Klasse reintun.
So werden nach verschiedende Level Perks Freigeschaltet womit man es leichter im Spiel hat.

Ja und das war es schon fast im großen und ganzen...

-Der Killer Spielt immer in Ego-Perspektive 
-Die Überlebenden Spielen in Third-Person

Außerdem hat das Spiel eine Super Atmosphäre egal wenn man Spielt.
Naja also mit den Überlebenden hat man ständig Angst und muss aufpassen nicht erwischt zu werden.
Der Killer hingegen hat mehr Zeit druck alle Überlebende zu Töten oder eher gesagt zu Verhindern das sie Entkommen.

Ich mag das Spiel ich kenne dieses 1 gegen 4 Prinzip ja von Evolve und selbst da habe ich nur das Monster gespielt da es mir Spaß macht anderen auf die Mütze zu geben :D
Wenn Ich Überlebender spiele ist es ratsam ein kühlen Kopf zu bewahren sonst kann dies schnell in die Hose gehen.. :D 

Seine eigende Klasse ist schnell gefunden entweder will man Laufen oder Jagen...

Ich Empfehle mit diesem Review euch das Spiel !

Ach und nebenbei Grafik mäßig sieht das Spiel auch noch schick aus! :)
Töte deine Freunde!!!

Moi qui trouvait la beta trop buguée je retrouve EXACTEMENT les mêmes bugs dans la version complète auxquels viennent s'ajouter d'autres désagréments, c'est innadmissible !
Ajoutez à ça le reandom TOTAL du système de récompenses et le déséquilibre incroyable du gameplay et ça ressemble pas mal à de l'incompétence de la part des développeurs.

Par conséquent je doute fortement que ces problèmes de fonds soient réglés par la suite...

Ce jeu avait pourtant beaucoup de potentiel...

Впервые встречаю нечто подобное, задумка игры шикарная. Но бл@ть! если тебя вешают на крюк то помощи от команды не жди. Каждый занят своими делами: один чинит генераторы(видать механик сука), другой афк, а третий и вовсе сидит  в кустах дрочит! Есть еще большое "НО" - это призрак. 60-70% игроков за маньяков, выбирают только Призрака... Кто не знает, это самый блядь имбовый киллер!.. А так в целом, я доволен этой игрой, проведу в ней как минимум 100часов, а может и больше. Лучшее что вышло этим летом!
Рекомендую: 9/10.

Friend wanted me to get this game to play with him. Bought the game and spent 15 mins joining and leaving matches trying to find him. Finally found him and we get into a match. Start fixing a generator. Game crashes. Restart process. Get into second game with him, and killer finds me and picks me up. start wiggling out of his grasp. Game crashes. try a solo game later. Game crashes. Wait a few days and see the game was updated.  Try again and make it a while before the killer ends my round. Was a quick match so decide to try again to make sure it wasnt just too short to crash. Start fixing generator. Game crashes.

Atualização 11/12

A cada atualização com adições de DLC o jogo vai ficando desbalanceado, e pelo tempo já se mostrou, quem pagar mais vai ter vantagem, assim fica díficil recomendar. 
-
Melhor jogo coop da atualidade, o que deixa um pouco a desejar é a comunidade que com o passar dos tempos está entendendo que para sucesso é necessário trabalhar em equipe, ao passar pode ficar um pouco enjoativo, espero posteriormente novos modos de jogo, pois a temática abrange grandes ideias.
-

Can not recommend to new players unless you are willing to invest 50+ hours. Game is extremely grind heavy and the learning curve is pretty steep. Devs also don't play their own game and make changes no one asked for while ignoring changes that the community asks for (years in most cases).
Très bon jeu avec quelques bug mais vaut vraiment le coup, même si on attends toujours une possibilité pour jouer à plusieurs avec des amis en ligne et pas en privé !
i recomend this game but it is very laggy for me

Unbalanced to the point of it being a chore. Not much fun unless you're playing the killer, which is why it takes a very long time to start a game when playing as the killer. 

Here's a small list of things that suck the fun right out of it, for me at least:

Bonus points are awarded to the killer upon anyone's dissconection, giving even MORE incentive to play as killer. 
No bonus points are awarded to those survivors that stay in the game (don't d/c early) until the end, or at least until they die. 
NO PENALTY for those that leave early.
No compensation in-game for the remaining survivors to make up for a missing team mate, such as faster generator repairs,  or removing a sacrificial hook.
No incentive to spectate after death, something like bonus points or a random common item would be a good start.
Too buggy. Hard to get into a lobby, cant join with friends. People leave left and right. Still feels like a beta.
Great game, even if they had some bad times with the balance, they kept it on and now they have a awesome popular game. Great to play with friends, never bored since they always release new content

- Get put in a bad lobby, where connection takes forever and only 3/4 survivors get into the game
- First two survivors go down fast. I try to sneakily get enough generators for trapdoor
- Killer catches me. Welp, I'll never get past rank 20 at this rate.
- Instead of hooking me, killer makes me his slave and makes me fix all generators
- I play along, waiting for the moment to escape and find the hatch.
- Get the last generator. I've outlived my usefulness. Killer picks me up
- He set me free and runs alongside me at the exit.

10/10 would befriend killer again.

This game doesn't offer very much.  The maps feel too similar, the only differences are the color of the map.  There are some perks you can pick up along the way, but if you don't use them that round you lose them, so the perks are often useless.  I like the game, I think it's entertaining, but in small doses.  It's really the same thing over and over and over again.  If there were more modes of play, more maps, stuff like that, I would give this game a thumbs up but as for right now, it's a thumbs down.

I had quite some fun playing this game for 20 minutes. The bad thing was I had to wait about 4 hours to actually join a game. I "failed to join lobby" so many times I lost count. 
A couple games later, the host had some 1980's internet quality and I was so laggy the game was completely unplayable, which meant I lost my rank and an item. Use servers instead of hosts pls.

Also, they said it was co-op. There is no such thing. I would love to see some sort of lobby system where you can actually play with 1 or 2 friends. Instead of 5. This is just plain stupid.

The game, in this state, its just bad. But it definately has potential.

10/10 Fuck this wonderful game

For a game that came out to the light recently and suddenly it is... Awesome! Of course, there are several bugs, but just look at version of the game. Dead by Daylight IS going to be developed in the future, but for now it perfoms itself great. The concept is interesting and simple at the same time: 4 survivors try to escape when 1 tough buddy whistles around to get a chance to kill them all. Actually, there are 3 types of the maniac that makes the game even more interesting. Every single character has its own features. Along with that, creators did not get lazy and created a pre-history to each of them. Gameplay is convenient and quite balanced for now. There are not so much buttons to push that is pretty nice so that you are not going to learn all the controls for long. Also there are tutorials that makes learning easy.
I recommend just to try this game. If you do not like it, what I doubt about, anyway you can refund it. BUT This Game IS MustToTry.
Fun game but best played with friends in private lobbies until devs allow you to join your friends in multiplayer lobbies. Gotten some pretty great moments with this game when playing with friends.

Enfin un très bon survival horreur à la hauteur de ce tag. Une prise en main simple, rapide et aussi efficace que agréable. Une mécanique de jeu précise et complexe qui demandera quelques heures pour atteindre un bon niveau. De plus, un gros point appréciable : le classement True Skill qui donne toujours plus envie de jouer. De plus, un excellent titre pour délirer entre potes. En bref, un très bon hit que je vous recommande.

after 4 years of making this review and coming back to the game, I have a couple more things to say: first of all they did fix and balance a lot of the stuff that was an issue when the game first launched. second, the devs switched to dedicated servers which make a lot of hits not seem to connect properly and third the addition of ranged killer which are some of the most broken ones due to them making it very hard to loop. its interesting how the game has evolved over the time and i will probably make another review in 4 years

[h1][b]Before you decide to buy this game, be aware that there is NO "Co-op" feature.[/b][/h1]

To me, it looked like the perfect game that I wanted to play with my friends, so I decided to purchase the game. After a few solo games in, I really liked it, so I convinced a friend to buy this game. After finally convincing him, we started the game together, and then we realized that there is no co-op feature, and that there is only the private match. I was very disappointed and so was my friend. We both ended up refunding the game, and then decided to never buy this game again. Would not buy this game for false advertisement of "Co-op". The Co-op tag should be removed from the tags applied.

I really like the concept of this game. The execution, not so much.

Pros:
*Great concept
*Asymmetrical gameplay
*Nice and moody feel

Cons:
*Really limited content - the game is basically a vertical slice of a game.
*Imbalanced gameplay - survivors win a lot
*Not actually scary
*Polish issues
*Unstable and buggy (at least at the time of my writing)

Just generally, I loved the concept and the screenshots, and the videos, and the twitch streamers playing it. My problem with this game is the execution of the actual game. Basically I didn't play it very long and I felt like I'd seen all the game had to offer through a handful of matches and like 30 minutes. What I played was more frustrating than scary and fun.

They've got a lot of problems to work through. For the time being, I do not recommend it.

I find this game fun to play at times but my only problem is that it takes a very long time to find a game.
They should certainly fix the disconnecting issue! but all things aside this game is very fun as a killer and 
survivor.

bug依旧存在，但是作为恐怖游戏的氛围很足，满足了不少人的需求。
如果你是想发泄，可以选鬼，我通过这个来发泄被蚊子叮咬的怒火，是的，所有开发电机的对我来说都是蚊子，都是打扰我睡觉的害虫。
如果你想体验清凉一下，那么选择人对你来说，是个好方法。在恐惧中战战兢兢，为你的酷暑注入一堆凉意。
这个游戏的优化还有很大空间，比如经常遇到鬼的房间很卡，莫名其妙被抓，而鬼自己却不卡；还有就是会遇到一些开挂的，有次就碰到过20段1000级的新人，呵呵。希望游戏添加及时举报系统，让这些开挂的少一点，净化游戏环境。

Dead by Daylight ist ein tolles Spiel welches ich trotz einiger Probleme empfehlen kann.

Was mich stört ist, dass ich immer wieder Probleme habe als Überlebender einer Lobby zu joinen, dauert meisten eine Weile und mann muss schon mal um die 6 Mal auf Lobby beitreten Klicken bis er mal richtig sucht und eine findet. Als Killer eine Lobby erstellen funktioniert meistens besser wenns nicht mal eben für 3 Minuten das Spiel einfriert weil gerade Leute beigetreten sind.

Auch verstehe ich nicht ganz die Punkteverteilung am Ende, hab einmal als Killer 3 Survivor erledigt und weniger Punkte erhlaten als in einer anderen Runde in der ich nur einen erwischt habe? Seltsam.

Und die Tatsache das ichs nur auf niedrig mit 20 fps Spielen kann aber z.B. Wolfenstein: The New Order auf Hohen Einstellungen mit 40 fps ist auch etwas ärgerlich.

This game is intenese. It's as if the good aspects of Evolve met Outlast. They do have some minor glitches but nothing game breaking that I have encountered yet.

[h1]Отличная игра, прекрасно передающая атмосферу американских ужастиков про маньяков. [/h1]

[quote]

Dead by Daylight（黎明杀机）
优点：
适中度的恐怖氛围，QTE带来更紧张的气氛，恰到好处的音效与音乐，游戏体验很棒！
缺点：
单一的玩法，轻微的不平衡，简陋的主菜单与物品介绍。另外，bE社的BUG永远都是那么的多，在不需要联机的游戏显得微不足道，但是在多人下就令人恶心！

偷电贼与农场主不得不说的故事，这么一想这游戏立马变得幽默许多。
可玩性非常强 比较耐玩 希望官方尽快出中文版本

This game is by far one of the most underated games ! 

The feel from the game = scary/tense which is excellent from both sides (killer or survivor)
if you like horror movies then enjoy being in one !

Apart from these players this game is one of my favourite games of all time because its something different !

Игра не плоха, но я брал с другом ради СОВМЕСТНОГО ПРОХОЖДЕНИЯ.... И ЕГО НЕТ. то есть он есть, но так весело играть один на один... Какого хрена не добавили игру с другом и с рандомами, я не понимаю. Точнее  понимаю, что бы баланс не нарушать, но тогда убирите метку СОВМЕСТНОЕ ПРОХОЖДЕНИЕ.
Если вы с другом или даже 2-мя собрались поиграть, то учтите, что нормальная ранговая игра только в одиночку, ну или через пень колоду, выбирая другие страны что бы на 1 2 3 попадать в случайное лобби с друзьями.

(Updated review 8/6/16)

Now that you can survive with your friends. I definitely recommend playing this game. 

One big thing I do not like is clicking the god damn READY button all the damn time! I'm no game programmer but couldn't there be a list of game servers or just click the damn ready button once and it will queue you from there on? When I play with my friends, half of our time is literally waiting to get into a game, and there's a good chance that we will get disconnected in that lobby or in game. 

The game is really fun. It's pretty thrilling the first few times you play it. After a while it's not scary anymore, but surprisingly still fun to play. I see a lot of people complain about the balance. I think the balance is fine. 

The only other problem I have is not with the game specifically as it is other players. I don't know if it works this way, but other players will DISCONNECT from the game to avoid dropping their rank. Very annoying especially if you are a survivor making your way to go unhook them from the altar to find them vanish when you almost save them.

While in the beginning the game was really fun it has now been mismanaged into the ground

- Lobby Joining is a ridiculous joke. Lobbies with 3 players rarely or never get filled up, you wait forever
- User interface - epic fail. Situation dependent choice of actions, usually the wrong one like healing yourself when actually you want to unhook a teammate or pick up an item in front of a hooked survivor instead of unhooking
- balance - the release of every new killer who defies survivor activities like the nurse and never adapting map design is a joke as well. Maps now get generated with vast areas of open space where you cant hide and cant get away from the killer, for example shelter woods with nothing but thin trees and small rocks in one entire third of the map - i have seen it happen
- bug fixes - having different hit box sizes for killers and survivors enables survivors to loop the killer on small rocks or boxes almost infinitely and the killer can bodyblock survivors in the basement stairs - absolutely inacceptable 
- cheesy fixes for map design mistakes like shutting most windows and reducing the number of pallets to almost nothing and opening all walls and having obstacles which are none because the killer can look over them
- cheesy fixes for incapable killers like the crystal clear vision across almost the entire map vision introduced in 1.4 and the increase in gen repair times and now healing times
- wallhack perk after wallhack perk for killers....BBQ, Nurses Calling, Rancor, Bitter Murmur in a game that should rely on stealth for survivors (especially the doctor to whom survivor positions get disclosed just by walking around in treatment mode without any skill whatsoever)
- map errors - after 2 years I still get stuck close to trees every now and then, they should have reworked this by now or implemented some routine to get players afffected unstuck
- this company prefers to put effort and ressources into some kind of GESTAPO denouncment and banning system instead of improving the game and coding it so that certain actions are just not possible aor punished in game they prefer to revoke the license to the player and I wonder if that is even legally correct

So for me meanwhile this game counts as one of the biggest failures in game design AND coding
Daaaaamn thats one hell of a good game. I approve.
